keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.

keywords.name: Hierophant:enlightened
keywords.description: Gain an additional 50% Piety while Enlightened.

keywords.name: Hierophant:fervor
keywords.description: Your next attack this turn deals 10% additional damage per level of Fervor.

keywords.name: Hierophant:gilded
keywords.description: When you add this card to your deck, add a Doubloon to your deck.

keywords.name: Hierophant:hoard
keywords.description: Earn gold at the end of combat if this card is not exhausted.

keywords.name: Hierophant:piety
keywords.description: At the end of your turn, defeat ANY enemies with HP equal or lower than your Piety and lose a third of your Piety.

keywords.name: Hierophant:tithe
keywords.description: When your energy is insufficient, can be partially paid with gold at a rate of 10 gold per missing Energy.

keywords.name: Hierophant:vow
keywords.description: Special Power that imposes a restriction in exchange for an advantage.

mods.name: The Hierophant
mods.description: A holy creature of grand aspirations, tested by greed. Converts its enemies through benevolence or bribery.
